name: Inventory Management System
description: Smart inventory management agent that tracks stock levels, predicts demand, and automates reordering processes

skills.name: trackInventory
skills.description: Monitors real-time inventory levels and provides stock status updates
examples: Check current stock levels for all products
Track product movement and usage patterns

skills.name: predictDemand
skills.description: Uses AI to forecast future demand based on historical data and market trends
examples: Predict next quarter's demand for seasonal items
Forecast inventory needs for product launch
Analyze demand patterns for holiday shopping
